attributes.action: Increase the cost of fuel in the cities to subsidise rural communities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We living in rural areas are paying more for fuel than across the rest of Britain. We have no public transport and it is impossible to live without a car. We have to drive to get to a supermarket, we have to drive to buy new clothes & we have to drive to visit a hospital. We have no choice in the matter, it is a necessity.
We signed below are calling for the price of fuel in cities to be increased to susidise the rural parts of Britain. This would also help combat the polution situation & discourage those that have alternative means of transport to actually use it and not their cars.
